Combining Untrained Monsters
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Studio (Combining/Breeding): Combining Untrained Monsters
By Seize on Saturday, January 25, 2003 - 10:32 pm:

Take a Raiden/Raiden Pass: Q
P 906,I 305,A 585,S 331,D 191,L 206

With any untrained (from the shrine) monster and get a Raiden/Raiden:
P 161,I 83,A 167,S 143,D 150,L 95

If you've trained one parent, train the other if you expect any results.
This may be old news but I haven't seen it posted anywhere.

By Seize on Saturday, January 25, 2003 - 10:41 pm:

I'm not sure I emphasised the point that the untrianed monster used didn't affect the outcome (of a Pure Raiden's stats) in any way.
